SEARCH
Package gw.plugin.financials

Interface ICCDefaultFXRateBuilderCustomInitializerPlugin

All Superinterfaces:
InternalPlugin, Remote
public interface ICCDefaultFXRateBuilderCustomInitializerPlugin extends InternalPlugin
The constructors in CCDefaultFXRateBuilder will initialize the new builder to create a DefaultFXRate equivalent to the supplied rate. Implement this plugin only if you need to perform additional work to prepare that builder, like populating extension fields, or overriding decisions made by the base initialization logic.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    customInitBuilderFromFXRate(CCDefaultFXRateBuilder builder, FXRate sourceRate)
    Complete or correct the supplied builder such that it represents the supplied rate.
    default void
    customInitBuilderFromLegacyRate(CCDefaultFXRateBuilder builder, ExchangeRate sourceRate)
    Complete or correct the supplied builder such that it represents the supplied rate.

  • Method Details

    • customInitBuilderFromLegacyRate

      default void customInitBuilderFromLegacyRate(CCDefaultFXRateBuilder builder, ExchangeRate sourceRate)
      Complete or correct the supplied builder such that it represents the supplied rate. The builder passed to this method has already gone through the default initialization. See the class comment for more details.

      For instance 

      
 @Override
 public void customInitBuilderFromLegacyRate(CCDefaultFXRateBuilder builder, ExchangeRate sourceRate) {
    if (!sourceRate.ExchangeRateSet.MarketRates) {
      builder.withMarket(FXRateMarket.TC_CORPORATE) // override value set by base initialization logic
    }
    builder.withMyCustomField_Ext(sourceRate.MyCustomFieldExt) // copy an extension field
 }
      Parameters:
      builder - A builder that has already completed the default initialization
      sourceRate - The rate to copy

    • customInitBuilderFromFXRate

      default void customInitBuilderFromFXRate(CCDefaultFXRateBuilder builder, FXRate sourceRate)
      Complete or correct the supplied builder such that it represents the supplied rate. The builder passed to this method has already gone through the default initialization. See the class comment for more details.

      For instance 

      
 @Override
 public void customInitBuilderFromFXRate(CCDefaultFXRateBuilder builder, FXRate sourceRate) {
    builder.withMyCustomField_Ext(sourceRate.MyCustomFieldExt) // copy an extension field
 }
      Parameters:
      builder - A builder that has already completed the default initialization
      sourceRate - The rate to copy
